productName: Memory Sync Round 3 — Business Operations, Travel & Financial Domains
overview: Extract facts from Jay's Notion workspace covering palm oil business, travel history, loan portfolio, education/career, registered companies, financial planning, international contacts, side projects, and grant programs. Push atomic memories to Mem0 Cloud (api.mem0.ai). No code changes — purely API operations.
goals: Capture palm oil inheritance business operations and seasonal patterns
Document Jay's travel history across 10+ international trips
Map complete loan portfolio across all properties and vehicles
Record education timeline from NCC diploma through I-Skill to AWS certification
Document all SSM-registered companies under Jay and Niko
Each fact is atomic: one subject, one predicate, retrievable via semantic search

userStories.title: Travel History — Chronological Trace
userStories.description: Fetch the 'Wenjyue Lew Travel History: A Chronological Trace' summary page and key trip pages (Batam-Singapore Dec 2023, Manila-Palawan Jan 2024, Kota Kinabalu Mar 2024, Angeles City/Tokyo Jun 2024, Jakarta-Bandung Aug 2024, Thailand 2022, CNY trips). Extract: destinations, dates, companions, accommodation, purpose.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch travel history summary page and 4-5 trip itinerary pages
Extract: destinations, dates, travel companions, accommodation, trip purpose
Push 10-15 atomic facts about travel history
Verify via Mem0 search for 'travel' and 'trip'
notionSearchQueries: Wenjyue Lew Travel History Chronological Trace

userStories.title: Palm Oil Business — Inherited Operations
userStories.description: Fetch the Palm Oil Operations Hub, Palm Oil Operations Index, and palm oil summary pages. Extract: inheritance details (from father and uncle), buyer (Guan Soon Lee), seasonal patterns, production areas, income data, Uncle Wong role, fertilizer details.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch Palm Oil Operations Hub and summary pages
Extract: inheritance, buyer, seasonal cycle, production areas, key contacts
Push 8-12 atomic facts about palm oil business
Verify via Mem0 search for 'palm oil'
notionSearchQueries: Palm Oil Uncle Wong Bank Account

userStories.title: Loan Portfolio — All Property and Vehicle Loans
userStories.description: Fetch the 'loan account' database page, 'Consolidate all debts' page, and individual loan pages (112 Senai Baru, KSL B2215, KSL B3303, House 172 UOB, Aruz hire purchase). Extract: bank, account numbers, monthly payments, total loan amounts, property addresses. NO login credentials.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch loan account database and 4-5 individual loan pages
Extract: bank, loan amount, monthly installment, property/asset, account number
Push 10-15 atomic facts about loans
Verify via Mem0 search for 'loan' and 'mortgage'

userStories.title: Jay's Education and Career Timeline
userStories.description: Fetch education pages: Postgraduate Diploma in Strategic Business IT (NCC/Sunderland), certificates page (文凭 certificate), I-Skill legacy page, EPSON career, and Important Milestones page (education sections). Extract: degrees, institutions, years, career positions, certifications.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch education and career pages
Extract: degrees, institutions, years, career milestones
Push 8-10 atomic facts about education and career
Verify via Mem0 search
notionSearchQueries: I-Skill Computer Training Center decade legacy

userStories.title: Registered Companies — SSM Active List
userStories.description: Fetch the 'Senarai Syarikat Aktif' page listing all companies under Jay (Lew Wen Jyue) and Niko (Lew Huey Wen). Extract: company names, SSM numbers, business types, addresses, ownership.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch active companies list page
Extract: company names, SSM registration numbers, types, addresses
Push 8-12 atomic facts about registered companies
Verify via Mem0 search for 'SSM' and 'company'
notionSearchQueries: Senarai Syarikat Aktif Wenjyue Lew Niko

userStories.title: Financial Plan and Debt Strategy
userStories.description: Fetch the 'Financial Plan for Lew Wen Jyue' page and 'Finance Operations Index'. Extract: income sources summary, debt service ratio, financial goals, monthly fixed costs, business income breakdown.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch financial plan and finance operations index pages
Extract: income sources, DSR, financial goals, expense categories
Push 6-10 atomic facts about financial planning
Verify via Mem0 search
notionSearchQueries: Financial Plan for Lew Wen Jyue
Finance Operations Index Income Loans Payments

userStories.title: International Friends and Encounters
userStories.description: Fetch 'International Friends Encounter Summary' page and 'Do Thi Linh' detailed profile. Extract: friend nationalities, meeting contexts, key characteristics, relationship details.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch international friends summary and individual profile pages
Extract: names, nationalities, meeting context, relationship nature
Push 6-10 atomic facts
Verify via Mem0 search
